message.name: HTTP_404_FILE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for the specified file. Please use a valid file ID and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_API_NOT_ENABLED
message.locale: The requested API is not enabled. This API may be enabled by setting the corresponding property.

message.name: ERR_CODETABLE_CODE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The specified code given for the documentTypeCode attribute does not exist. Please use a valid code from the DocumentType codetable and try again.

message.name: ERR_NO_FILENAME
message.locale: No filename has been given in the file metadata custom header. It is mandatory to supply a value for the filename.

message.name: ERR_NO_METADATA
message.locale: It is mandatory to send metadata in the specified custom request header, that contains the filename of the file. Other metadata attributes are optional.

message.name: HTTP_403_UNAUTHORIZED_ACCESS
message.locale: You are not authorized to access this file.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_FILE
message.locale: There is a problem with the contents of the file.

message.name: ERR_NO_FILE_CONTENTS
message.locale: The file does not exist or is an empty file with no content. Please specify a different file and try again.

message.name: ERR_EXTERNAL_FILE_REFERENCE
message.locale: The requested file does not store the contents of the file, it only stores a reference to a file located on another system. This API cannot be used to retrieve these details, however some File Location APIs are available for this purpose.

message.name: WARN_NO_FILE_VALIDATION_IMPLEMENTED
message.locale: "No implementation for file validation has been found, when uploading a file via a REST API. Unless file validation and virus scanning is handled elsewhere, the RESTFileValidationHook interface should be implemented."
